name: Attack Roll
description:
Attack Roll is a FPS game in which you use your dice rolls to shoot your enemies!

Originally made for the GMTK 2022 Gamejam with the theme "Roll of the dice".

This is the first time I publish anything on itch, so comments and feedback are more than appreciated!

==================================================

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left click - Shoot

Right click - Reload

NOTE:
There is a bug with the WebGL version of the game that causes the cursor to drift in a random direction, playing in full-screen mode fixes the issue.
